bio: Copin.io is an analytics infrastructure for Perpetual DEX protocols. Copin allows users to explore, analyze, and copy on-chain traders from the Perpetual DEXs.
contributionDescription:
Copin.io is an analytics infrastructure solution for Perpetual DEX protocols. Copin allows users to explore, analyze, and copy on-chain traders from the Perpetual DEXs. 

Copin enhances the project as a decentralized copy trading aggregator that delivers a user experience (UX/UI) to a new level of simplicity, user-friendliness, and comprehensive information for both new and professional users. This will help users easily find valuable insights from on-chain traders, instilling confidence in their decision-making when copying on-chain traders.

After we launched a private beta version that boasts 360 users who have executed over 11,000 copy orders, at a trading volume of $3.7M. And notably, Synthetix has granted our contributions regarding the trader profile explore feature.

contributionLinks.description: Dapp Link (private beta version), all features are available for free.
Copin's statistics after 2 months of launching the private beta version

impactDescription:
Copin is confident in its contributions to the Optimism ecosystem, offering the following values: We provide an additional layer to the Optimism ecosystem, with a specific focus on Synthetix. This addition brings value to the users and trader community of Synthetix by offering a comprehensive on-chain perpetual trader analysis tool for behavior, transaction history, performance statistics, and insightful data regarding traders on Kwenta and Polynomial. 

In doing so, Copin helps new users access the Synthetix future market by utilizing data from Kwenta and Polynomial, making its mark on Synthetix with a pioneering Copy Trading on-boarding product that brings millions of users from Web2, non-DeFi.
